hero.name: Pieter OHearn
hero.title: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer
hero.tagline: I build reliable products end-to-end, from clean APIs to crisp UIs. Passionate about creating scalable solutions that users love.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: With over 5 years of experience, I specialise in building scalable web applications and leading technical initiatives that drive business growth. I'm passionate about clean code, user experience, and mentoring the next generation of developers.

education.title: Bachelor of Engineering Honours, Software Engineering

experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer
highlights: Develop and maintain native app frameworks, SDKs, and backend systems for a digital ID wallet platform.
Build scalable, secure solutions ensuring seamless integration between Angular mobile apps and backend services.
Uphold strong privacy and security standards, delivering a reliable, user-centric identity experience.

experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer
highlights: Specialised in React Native development for Android and iOS, maintaining an app used by over five million citizens.
Built a shared component library to improve accessibility (WCAG 2.2 AA) and design consistency across teams.
Delivered key citizen-facing features, including a secure notifications inbox and scalable grants service.

experience.title: Full-Stack Engineer
highlights: Re-architected a legacy monolith into scalable microservices with asynchronous queues and auto-scaling for high availability.
Improved reliability and performance through observability tooling, reducing incidents and cutting API latency by up to 60%.
Designed and validated a new database schema and introduced a BFF layer for faster, data-driven frontend experiences.

experience.title: Junior Full-Stack Engineer
highlights: Built and optimised REST APIs for a high-traffic notifications platform, ensuring reliability and scalability.
Worked with cross-functional teams to deliver smooth integrations between backend services and frontend interfaces.
Improved frontend performance and accessibility, achieving faster load times and better UX scores.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: A selection of projects that showcase my technical expertise and problem-solving approach. Each project demonstrates different aspects of full-stack development and system architecture.

featured.title: Specialty Coffee Log
featured.description: AI-powered tasting insights for coffee lovers.
featured.longDescription: A comprehensive coffee tracking application that uses machine learning to analyze tasting notes, brewing methods, and personal preferences to provide personalized recommendations.

ai: OpenAI GPT-4 for tasting note analysis
Custom ML model for flavor profiling

data.intro: The application follows a microservices architecture with event-driven communication between services. Data flows through a robust pipeline designed for scalability and real-time processing.

cards.title: Data Ingestion
cards.description: User inputs and external coffee data are processed through validation layers and stored in PostgreSQL with automatic backup to S3.

cards.title: Processing
cards.description: Background jobs analyze tasting notes using NLP, generate flavor profiles, and update recommendation models in real-time.

cards.title: Delivery
cards.description: Processed insights are cached in Redis and delivered through optimized APIs with sub-100ms response times.

ai.intro: Advanced AI features power the core recommendation engine and provide personalized insights that help users discover new coffee experiences tailored to their preferences.

sections.title: Recommendation Engine
sections.description: Uses collaborative filtering combined with content-based recommendations to suggest coffee beans, brewing methods, and flavor combinations.
highlights: Cosine similarity for user preferences
Matrix factorization for sparse data
Real-time model updates

sections.title: Natural Language Processing
sections.description: Analyzes user-generated tasting notes to extract flavor profiles and brewing insights using state-of-the-art language models.
highlights: Sentiment analysis on reviews
Named entity recognition for flavors
Automatic tagging and categorization

otherProjects.title: CodeKoala 🐨
otherProjects.description: Your friendly, local-first LLM-powered code reviewer that analyzes Git changes and provides AI-driven feedback on code quality and best practices.
highlights: Runs local AI to analyse and review git diff changes
Generates structured, context-aware commit messages
Designed for speed and efficiency with small local models

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, collaborations, or just having a conversation about technology and innovation.
